# vDSP_DFT_Direction.INVERSE

**Case**

A constant that specifies an inverse transform.

## Declaration

```swift
case INVERSE
```

## Discussion

Use [doc://com.apple.accelerate/documentation/Accelerate/vDSP_DFT_Direction/INVERSE] to transform a signal from the frequency domain to the time domain.

## Constants

- **vDSP_DFT_Direction.FORWARD**: A constant that specifies a forward transform.

items.description: A constant that specifies a forward transform.
